function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low humidity levels allow droplets to become droplet nuclei, remain in the air for prolonged periods of time, and travel for long distances.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 infection.","Mitigation":"Maintain indoor humidity levels between 40% and 60% as recommended by ASHRAE.","Technologies":"Humidifiers, HVAC systems with humidity control.","People":"Occupants of indoor environments.","Owner":"Building managers, facility managers."},{"Description":"Viruses and bacteria thrive on dry conditions.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Maintain indoor humidity levels between 40% and 60% as recommended by ASHRAE.","Technologies":"Humidifiers, HVAC systems with humidity control.","People":"Occupants of indoor environments.","Owner":"Building managers, facility managers."},{"Description":"Human mucus barrier weakens with low humidity levels.","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to respiratory infections.","Mitigation":"Maintain indoor humidity levels between 40% and 60% as recommended by ASHRAE.","Technologies":"Humidifiers, HVAC systems with humidity control.","People":"Occupants of indoor environments.","Owner":"Building managers, facility managers."}]}
